feed.title: Track Awesome Yew Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: üòé A curated list of awesome things related to Yew / WebAssembly.

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on Mar 24 - Mar 30, 2025
entry.content:
Projects

  • layout-viewer - Examine layouts of integrated circuits with zoom and pan controls.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Mar 24 - Mar 30, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on Jan 13 - Jan 19, 2025
entry.content:
Projects

  • PixelGuesser (‚≠ê8) - PixelGuesser is a real life party gam where players try to guess the contents of an image as quickly as possible.
  • candle-wasm-examples (‚≠ê18k) - Candle is a minimalist ML framework for Rust with a focus on performance (including GPU support) and ease of use. Try our online demos: whisper, LLaMA2, T5, yolo, Segment Anything.

Articles / Frameworks

  • Adding Tailwind to Yew
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Jan 13 - Jan 19, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on Dec 09 - Dec 15, 2024
entry.content:
Crates / Component Libraries

  • Rust Lucide - Yew port of Lucide, a beautiful & consistent icon toolkit made by the community.
  • Rust Radix - Yew port of Radix, a library of components, icons, colors, and templates for building high-quality, accessible UI.
  • Rust shadcn/ui - Yew port of shadcn/ui, a library of beautifully designed components that you can copy and paste into your apps.

Crates / Utils

  • Rust Floating UI - Floating UI is a library that helps you create "floating" elements such as tooltips, popovers, dropdowns, and more.
entry.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Dec 09 - Dec 15, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on Sep 16 - Sep 22, 2024
entry.content:
Projects

  • konnektoren.help - An interactive web application for learning German grammar, featuring gamified challenges and a map-based interface. Web App
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Sep 16 - Sep 22, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on May 13 - May 19, 2024
entry.content:
Projects

  • Kiomet (‚≠ê118) - An online real-time strategy game in which you expand your territory by capturing towers.
  • PinePods (‚≠ê436) - PinePods is a Rust based podcast management system that manages podcasts with multi-user support and relies on a central database with clients to connect to it.
  • 0721 (‚≠ê11) - The engine of image hosting written in Rust.
  • Hikari (‚≠ê21) - The Frontend of Everything.
  • simply-view-image-for-python-debugging (‚≠ê66) - Visual studio code extension simply view the image of the image variables when debugging python.
  • Mindsweeper (‚≠ê76) - A principled take on minesweeper, Live Demo.
  • scap-rs (‚≠ê21) - National Vulnerability Database (NVD) implemented by Rust, Live Demo.
  • Sentry Relay (‚≠ê345) - The Sentry Relay is a service that pushes some functionality from the Sentry SDKs as well as the Sentry server into a proxy process.
  • Syre (‚≠ê18) - Scientific data management and insights.
  • chipbox (‚≠ê113) - chipbox is an open-source desktop DAW written in Rust.
  • Taxy (‚≠ê146) - A reverse proxy server with built-in WebUI, supporting TCP/HTTP/TLS/WebSocket, written in Rust.
  • Proxelar (‚≠ê442) - Rust-based Man in the Middle proxy, an early-stage project aimed at providing visibility into network traffic.
  • diff.rs (‚≠ê126) - Web application to render a diff between Rust crate versions. Implemented in Yew, runs fully in the browser as WebAssembly, Live Demo.

Alternatives / Frameworks

  • Leptos (‚≠ê19k) - Build fast web applications with Rust.
entry.summary: 14 awesome projects updated on May 13 - May 19, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on May 06 - May 12, 2024
entry.content:
Projects

  • SandCat (‚≠ê59) - The software has primarily implemented the basic functionalities of an IM application, which includes a fundamental friend system, one-on-one chat, group chat, and one-on-one audio/video calls. It also supports i18n and currently offers a switch between Chinese and English.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on May 06 - May 12, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on Nov 28 - Dec 04, 2022
entry.content:
Projects

  • theiskaa.com (‚≠ê1) - A real world implementation of Yew framework. Live at theiskaa.com.
  • live-ask.com (‚≠ê103) - Realtime Event/Meetup Q&A Platform. Live at live-ask.com.

Crates / Wasm

  • tauri-sys (‚≠ê108) - Raw bindings to the Tauri API for projects using wasm-bindgen.

Tooling / Frameworks

  • Tauri (‚≠ê94k) - Tauri is a framework for building tiny, blazingly fast binaries for all major desktop platforms. Developers can integrate any front-end framework that compiles to HTML, JS and CSS for building their user interface. The backend of the application is a rust-sourced binary with an API that the front-end can interact with.

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on Feb 28 - Mar 06, 2022
entry.content:
Projects

  • Realworld example (‚≠ê885) - Exemplary real world app built with Rust + Yew + WebAssembly. It utilizes Yew's latest function components and hooks. It also supports desktop application powered by Tauri (‚≠ê94k).
  • Marc Portfolio - A software developer portfolio, Live Demo.

Crates / Component Libraries

  • yew-chart (‚≠ê65) - A Yew-based charting library that provides SVG based components for rendering charts.

Crates / Utils

  • Tailwind RS (‚≠ê119) - Tailwind style tracer in rust, JIT + AOT interpreter.

Articles / Frameworks

  • A code walkthrough video of Yew with a real-world app with Christopher Hunt and Kiki Carter

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on Dec 14 - Dec 20, 2020
entry.content:
Projects

  • rust-async-wasm-demo (‚≠ê50) - Toy project to learn Rust and async that can be deployed to the web.

Crates / Component Libraries

  • muicss-yew (‚≠ê37) - MUI-CSS Components for Yew framework.
  • yew-bulma (‚≠ê21) - A Rust library providing components based on the bulma css library for projects using Yew.
  • ybc (‚≠ê255) - A Yew component library based on the Bulma CSS framework.
  • patternfly-yew (‚≠ê161) - Patternfly components for Yew.

Crates / Components

  • Yew Form (‚≠ê97) - Components to simplify handling forms with Yew.

Crates / Utils

  • reacty_yew (‚≠ê54) - Generate Yew components from React components via Typescript type definitions.

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on Feb 17 - Feb 23, 2020
entry.content:
Official

  • Yew (‚≠ê32k) - Rust / WebAssembly framework for building client web apps.

Projects

  • web-view todomvc desktop app (‚≠ê110) - Demo how to use yew for a todomvc that compiles to WebAssembly and is bundled as a lightweight(~2mb) desktop app by web-view (‚≠ê1.9k), as an alternative to Electron, web-view (‚≠ê1.9k) also has a demo (‚≠ê1.9k).
  • Kirk (‚≠ê44) - Just A Rust WebAssembly Blog.

Crates / Wasm

  • wasm-bindgen (‚≠ê8.3k) - Facilitating high-level interactions between WebAssembly modules and JavaScript.

Tooling / Frameworks

  • wasm-pack (‚≠ê6.7k) - Your favorite Rust -> WebAssembly workflow tool.

Alternatives / Frameworks

  • Draco (‚≠ê302) - A Rust library for building client side web applications with WebAssembly.
  • Sauron (‚≠ê2k) - Sauron is an HTML web framework for building web-apps.

Related lists / Frameworks

  • Awesome Rust and WebAssembly (‚≠ê664) - A list of awesome Rust and WebAssembly projects, libraries, tools, and resources.
  • Awesome WebAssembly (‚≠ê9.3k) - Collection of awesome things regarding WebAssembly ecosystem.
  • Awesome Rust (‚≠ê51k) - A curated list of Rust code and resources.

entry.title: Awesome Yew Updates on Jan 06 - Jan 12, 2020
entry.content:
Projects

  • yew-react-example (‚≠ê66) - This project shows how to create a web app using a React component inside a Yew component.

Crates / Wasm

  • stdweb (‚≠ê3.5k) - Provides Rust bindings to the Web APIs and to allow a high degree of interoperability between Rust and JavaScript.

Tooling / Frameworks

  • cargo-web (‚≠ê1.1k) - A Cargo subcommand for the client-side Web.
  • wabt (‚≠ê7.4k) - The WebAssembly Binary Toolkit, for the wasm-strip and wasm-objdump tools to reduce .wasm file size.
  • binaryen (‚≠ê8k) - Compiler infrastructure and toolchain library for WebAssembly, for the wasm-opt tool to reduce .wasm file size.

Books / Frameworks

  • The WebAssembly Book - Working with the web and producing .wasm files.
  • The wasm-bindgen Guide - How to bind Rust and JavaScript APIs.

Alternatives / Frameworks

  • Percy (‚≠ê2.3k) - A modular toolkit for building isomorphic web apps with Rust + WebAssembly.
  • Seed (‚≠ê3.8k) - A Rust framework for creating web apps.
  • Smithy (‚≠ê348) - A framework for building WebAssembly apps in Rust.
entry.summary: 10 awesome projects updated on Jan 06 - Jan 12, 2020

entry.content:
Official

Projects

  • webapp.rs (‚≠ê2.2k) - A web application completely written in Rust, frontend is built with Yew.

Templates

  • yew-wasm-pack-template (‚≠ê119) - A template for starting a Yew project to be used with wasm-pack.
  • yew-wasm-pack-minimal (‚≠ê112) - A minimal template for starting a Yew project using wasm-bindgen and wasm-pack.
  • yew-parcel-template (‚≠ê112) - Awesome Yew with Yew-Router and Parcel application.
